trends: There have been 18 other sightings in New Port Richey
There were no other sightings in New Port Richey on or around November 30th 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS ASLEEP & AWAKENED due to convulsing or something similiar. Walked outside to clear myself. Looked over my left shoulder & up & saw a silent black wedge like triangle above me. Not far away, seemed very close just above the house. It just dissapeared. No sound,movement. Winked out. But not immediately, I was able to view it for awhile & then just gone. Never seen again.
